name: Infostud
tag_list: employment, serbia, education, e-business, informal-education, hr, market-leader
overview:
Infostud is a company that develops and manages internet websites and promotes development of eâ€“business in Serbia.

Infostud consists of 7 websites that are easy to use and very informative:

  • Lots of useful information in one place
  • Made for your needs
  • All websites are market leaders

How did it all start?

  • Infostud was created in the end of 2000. as a student website
  • First big project was publishing results from all admission tests on - universities in Serbia on 2001.
  • Positive feedback from visitors that kept things going on
  • Completely financed from own sources
  • In 2003. we started publishing job ads on website
  • Soon Infostud grew out of image of student project, opened offices, and transformed into a profitable company
  • Over 30 employees, average age between 28 â€“ 29.

poslovi.infostud.com (Leading employment website in Serbia) mojtim.infostud.com (Website for HR experts) znanje.infostud.com (Website that encourages learning and lifelong education) prijemni.infostud.com (Website about admission to universities in Serbia)

With its websites Infostud wants to highlight the connection between higher education and market needs for educated experts and profiles.
